name: SPIbelt Sport Dual-Pocket - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Holds your stuff securely, without bouncing or shifting while you run. Great for long-duration training sessions and races, or to take with you when travelling.Expandable pockets on left and right sides.Large pocket is 15 x 7.5 x 5cm.Small pocket is 7.5 x 7.5 x 5cm (fits an iPhone®).Fits waists 29 to 50in.
